item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在 S&P 500 指数创下今年第 41 个新高之后，美国股市似乎将出现下滑，亚洲股市则受到中国股市的提振，而黄金则再创历史新高。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. US Stocks look set to slip after the S&P 500 posted its 41st record of the year, Asian shares get a boost from China and Gold hits another all-time peak. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 印度顶级证券交易所价值翻番，首次公开募股有望成功
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，印度国家证券交易所有限公司在私募市场上的估值在过去四个月里翻了一番，达到 360 亿美元，这是因为投资者预计该公司最早可能在明年第一季度进行首次公开募股。【原文：National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.’s valuation in the private markets has doubled to $36 billion in the last four months, backed by investor expectation that an initial public offering could materialize as early as the first quarter of next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欣喜情绪褪去后，中国干预股市的道路依然漫长
item.description: 中国承诺提供高达 3,400 亿美元的资金来提振陷入困境的股市，这与国内和日本过去的努力不谋而合。【原文：China’s pledge of up to $340 billion to boost its ailing equities is invoking parallels with past efforts at home and in Japan that largely faltered in lifting the economy after an initial burst of enthusiasm.】

item.title: 动视和暴雪的企业魔兽内幕
item.description:
鲍比-科蒂克（Bobby Kotick）和迈克-莫海姆（Mike Morhaime）曾是视频游戏行业不可阻挡的一对，直到他们互相争斗。新书Play Nice节选。【原文：

Bobby Kotick and Mike Morhaime were the video game industry’s unstoppable pair, until they fought each other. An excerpt from the new book Play Nice.

】

item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，铃木将在印度扩建门店，丰田将在印度建厂
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周三报道，日本汽车制造商铃木计划到 2030 财年将其在印度的汽车经销商数量增加 70%，达到约 6800 家。【原文：Japanese automaker Suzuki plans to increase the number of car dealerships it has in India by 70% to around 6,800 by fiscal 2030, Nikkei reported Wednesday.】

item.title: 分析师热捧法航荷航股票，法航荷航前景光明
item.description: 据分析师称，法航荷航明年的前景一片光明，在经历了艰难的一年后，他们开始对该公司股票产生好感。【原文：Air France-KLM’s outlook for next year is brightening, according to analysts, who are starting to warm to the stock after a tough year.】

item.title: 游说团体称欧洲汽车业面临完美风暴
item.description: 欧洲汽车游说团体负责人表示，在欧盟出台更严格的减少碳排放新法规之前，欧洲汽车制造商正面临着日益严峻的挑战，因为电动汽车的需求令人失望，成本也在上升。【原文：Europe’s automakers are facing deepening challenges as demand for EVs disappoints and costs rise, ahead of tougher new European Union regulation to reduce carbon emissions, according to the head of the region’s car lobby group.】

item.title: 贝莱德看好亚洲基础设施的增长，以支持人工智能的蓬勃发展
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）认为，亚洲的基础设施建设将迎来巨大的发展机遇，以支持人工智能的蓬勃发展，同时刺激能源和水资源的需求。【原文：BlackRock Inc. sees huge growth opportunities in Asia for infrastructure to support a boom in artificial intelligence that’s also spurring energy and water demand.】

item.title: 中国提振新兴市场股市，创七月以来最长连胜纪录
item.description: 新兴市场股市连续第五天上涨，原因是中国最新一轮的刺激政策继续刺激全球对高风险资产的偏好。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rise for a fifth straight day as China’s latest round of stimulus continues to fuel appetite for riskier assets globally.】

item.title: 美元接近抹去今年所有涨幅
item.description: 美元即将抹去今年以来的所有涨幅，因为市场押注美联储将以快于此前预期的速度削减利率，以支持经济。【原文：The US dollar is on the verge of erasing all of its gains this year on bets the Federal Reserve will slash rates at a faster pace than previously expected to support the economy.】

item.title: 德国希望德国商业银行具有 "最大可能的独立性
item.description: 德国政府重申反对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG），并表示希望这家德国第二大银行 "尽可能独立"。【原文：The German government reiterated its opposition to a takeover of Commerzbank AG by Italy’s UniCredit SpA, saying it wants the “greatest possible independence” for the country’s second-biggest lender.】

item.title: 马来西亚中央银行认为林吉特将获得 "持久支持
item.description: 马来西亚央行表示，鉴于该国良好的经济前景和结构性改革，林吉特的强势将持续下去。【原文：Malaysia’s central bank said the ringgit’s strength is set to last given the nation’s favorable economic outlook and structural reforms.】

item.title: 经合组织将英国经济增长上调至七国集团最高水平，但对通货膨胀提出警告
item.description: 经合组织（OECD）上调了英国未来两年的经济增长预测，上调幅度超过了七国集团中的任何其他国家，尽管人们对英国潜在的通胀压力仍有担忧。【原文：The OECD upgraded UK growth forecasts for the next two years by more than any other Group of Seven nation, despite lingering concerns about underlying inflation pressures in Britain.】

item.title: 全球经济摆脱通胀危机，实现稳定增长
item.description: 据经合组织（OECD）称，随着强劲通胀压力的缓解，各国央行得以继续谨慎地放松政策，全球经济正在步入新的稳定期。【原文：The global economy is settling into a newfound stability as the stress of strong inflation eases, allowing central banks to keep cautiously loosening policy, according to the OECD.】

item.title: 巴克莱称投资者在中国刺激政策下面临 "痛苦交易
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的策略师说，在中国这个世界第二大经济体推出新的刺激计划和美国联邦储备局（Federal Reserves）降息之后，那些冷落与中国经济增长相关股票的投资者可能会面临 "痛苦交易"。【原文：Investors who have snubbed stocks tied to Chinese growth may face a “pain trade” after the world’s second-biggest economy unleashed a new stimulus package and the Federal Reserves cut interest rates, strategists at Barclays Plc said.】

item.title: 汇丰银行改变欧洲央行预期，认为从 10 月起每次会议都会降息
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）的经济学家表示，欧洲央行将在 10 月至 4 月间的每次会议上开始降息。【原文：The European Central Bank will start cutting interest rates at every meeting between October and April, according to economists at HSBC.】

item.title: 干预风险降低，交易员青睐中国 5 年期债券
item.description: 由于中国五年期国债受央行干预的风险较低，交易商正在抢购这种国债。【原文：Traders are snapping up China’s five-year government bonds, attracted by the lower risk of central bank intervention for this maturity.】

item.title: 新世界考虑更换亿万富豪继承人郑志刚为首席执行官
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富豪郑氏家族旗下的香港房地产开发商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co., the Hong Kong property developer owned by the billionaire Cheng family, is considering replacing third-generation scion Adrian Cheng as chief executive officer after writedowns that led to the company’s first annual loss in two decades, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行首席财务官称投资银行实现 "健康 "增长
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）首席财务官詹姆斯-冯-莫尔特克（James von Moltke）表示，本季度投资银行业务实现了相当 "健康 "的增长，交易、发起和咨询业务均比去年同期有所增长。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is seeing quite “healthy” growth in the investment bank this quarter, with trading and origination and advisory both up from a year earlier, Chief Financial Officer James von Moltke said.】

item.title: Solaria 正洽谈为房地产部门融资 1.5 亿欧元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，西班牙太阳能开发商 Solaria Energia y Medio Ambiente SA 正在寻求投资者向其房地产部门注资约 1.5 亿欧元（1.68 亿美元）。【原文：Spanish solar developer Solaria Energia y Medio Ambiente SA is seeking investors to inject about €150 million ($168 million) in its real estate unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 工资下降，丹麦央行下调通胀预期
item.description: 丹麦中央银行下调了今明两年的通胀预期，表明这个北欧国家将避免工资价格螺旋式上升。【原文：Denmark’s central bank slashed its inflation forecasts for this year and the next, suggesting that the Nordic country will avoid a wage-price spiral.】

item.title: 德意志银行保持观望，裕信银行盯上德国商业银行
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）首席财务官詹姆斯-冯-莫尔特克（James von Moltke）周三有效地排除了暂时介入德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的可能性。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG Chief Financial Officer James von Moltke on Wednesday effectively ruled out getting involved with Commerzbank AG for now.】

item.title: 据说 Prosus 已完全退出中国 Trip.com 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，互联网投资公司 Prosus NV 已通过一笔 7.43 亿美元的大宗交易全额减持了中国在线旅行社 Trip.com 的股份，成为最新一家退出中国科技公司的国际投资者。【原文：Internet investing firm Prosus NV has fully cut its stake in Chinese online travel agency company Trip.com in a $743 million block trade, according to people familiar with the matter, becoming the latest international investor to exit a Chinese tech company.】

item.title: 瑞典央行将利率下调四分之一个百分点，为更大幅度降息敞开大门
item.description: 瑞典央行将借贷成本降低了四分之一个百分点，并提出了在未来几个月内采取更大举措的可能性，以刺激疲软的经济。【原文：Sweden’s Riksbank cut borrowing costs by a quarter point and raised the possibility of a bigger move in coming months in its bid to spur a listless economy.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行收购 CNP 和安联意大利人寿股权，首席执行官着眼于收入
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官安德烈亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）希望提高保险费和利润率，因此正在将其与 CNP Assurances 和安联（Allianz）合作经营的意大利寿险业务收归内部管理。【原文：UniCredit SpA is bringing the Italian life insurance businesses it operated with CNP Assurances and Allianz back in-house, as Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel eyes higher fees and profitability.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行的 Orcel 表示不会寻求德国商业银行董事会席位
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 表示，他不会为他在德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的贷款人寻求监事会席位。【原文：UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said he won’t seek a supervisory board seat for his lender at Commerzbank AG.】

item.title: Norinchukin 的债券损失将由外部专家审查
item.description: 日本农业部表示，一个由外部专家组成的小组将审查日本最大的农业银行 Norinchukin 是如何因持有债券而蒙受巨额票据损失的。【原文：Japan’s farm ministry said a panel of outside experts will examine how Norinchukin, the country’s largest agricultural bank, racked up huge paper losses on its bond holdings.】

item.title: 交易员权衡中国刺激政策，欧洲股市结束两日涨势
item.description: 欧洲股市结束了连续两日的上涨，因为投资者在权衡中国经济刺激计划带来的涨势是否可持续。【原文：European stocks snapped a two-day gaining streak as investors weighed the sustainability of China’s rally on its stimulus package.】

item.title: 法国九月份消费者信心指数意外上升
item.description: 法国消费者信心指数在9月份意外上升，达到自2022年2月俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来的最高水平。统计机构 Insee 的数据显示，消费者信心指数升至 95，高于经济学家的平均预期。消费支出一直是法国经济增长的一个薄弱环节，因此这份报告对法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶的新政府来说是一个意想不到的好消息。【原文：French consumer confidence unexpectedly rose in September to the highest level since February 2022, the month that Russia launched its invasion of Ukraine. The reading increased to 95, according to statistics agency Insee, higher than the mean estimate of economists. Consumer spending has been a weak spot recently in French growth, making the report an unexpected bit of good news for Prime Minister Michel Barnier’s new government.】

item.title: 野村和瑞穗是印度 Avendus Capital 的主要竞标者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，野村控股公司和瑞穗金融集团是竞购 KKR & Co.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. and Mizuho Financial Group Inc. are the leading bidders for a majority stake owned by KKR & Co. in one of India’s biggest investment banks, according to people familiar with the matter.】
